ai-tha-ap363:2.2_0: I’ll remember you as a charnel ground.
ai-tha-ap363:2.4_0: and went to the realm of the gods.
ai-tha-ap363:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap363:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap363:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap363:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap363:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nimitta.
